interpretation: The woman zombie represents a state of being trapped in a cycle of negative thoughts and behaviors. This card suggests a need to break free from old patterns and habits that no longer serve you. It may also indicate a feeling of being disconnected from others or society at large. The woman zombie reminds us that it is possible to overcome our inner demons and rise above our circumstances. Associated keywords include: stagnation, decay, transformation, and renewal. This card encourages us to embrace change and to let go of what no longer serves us, in order to move forward towards a brighter future.
